attributes.action: Total ban of the online sales of knives.
attributes.additional_details: Far too many people are being killed by young people carrying knives. It's now got to the stage where 13 and 14 year olds are killing each other
attributes.background: Introduce a total ban of online sales of any knives.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Ban selling knives online
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/710870
